mapper.insert: INSERT INTO transaction(tran_no, prod_no, buyer_id, payment_option, receiver_name, receiver_phone, dlvy_addr, dlvy_request, tran_status_code, order_date, dlvy_date) VALUES ( seq_transaction_tran_no.NEXTVAL, #{purchaseProd.prodNo:NUMERIC}, #{buyer.userId:VARCHAR}, #{paymentOption:CHAR}, #{receiverName:VARCHAR}, #{receiverPhone:VARCHAR}, #{divyAddr:VARCHAR}, #{divyRequest:VARCHAR}, #{tranCode:CHAR}, SYSDATE, #{divyDate:VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT tran_no, prod_no, buyer_id, payment_option, receiver_name, receiver_phone, dlvy_addr, dlvy_request, tran_status_code, order_date, dlvy_date FROM transaction WHERE tran_no = #{value}
SELECT tran_no, prod_no, buyer_id, payment_option, receiver_name, receiver_phone, dlvy_addr, dlvy_request, tran_status_code, order_date, dlvy_date FROM transaction WHERE prod_no = #{value}

SELECT tran_no, prod_no, buyer_id, tran_status_code, receiver_phone, prod_name FROM (SELECT inner_table.tran_no, inner_table.prod_no, inner_table.buyer_id, inner_table.tran_status_code, inner_table.receiver_phone, inner_table.prod_name, ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM (SELECT t.tran_no, p.prod_no, t.buyer_id, t.tran_status_code, t.receiver_phone, p.prod_name FROM transaction t, product p WHERE p.prod_no = t.prod_no AND t.buyer_id in #{buyerId} ORDER BY tran_no ) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{search.endRowNum} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{search.startRowNum} AND #{search.endRowNum}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT t.tran_no, p.prod_no, u.user_id, t.tran_status_code, t.receiver_phone, t.receiver_name FROM transaction t, product p, users u WHERE p.prod_no = t.prod_no AND t.buyer_id = u.user_id AND t.buyer_id in #{buyerId} ORDER BY tran_no )
